episodes.title: Risa Hontiveros sues Michael Maurilio for cyberlibel | ABS-CBN News
episodes.description:
Sen. Risa Hontiveros on Wednesday (July 9) filed a cyber libel complaint at the Department of Justice (DOJ) against Michael Maurilio alias "Rene," the former Senate witness against Kingdom of Jesus Christ (KOJC) leader Apollo Quiboloy. Maurilio had claimed that he was bribed by Hontiveros to testify against Quiboloy, former President Rodrigo Duterte and Vice President Sara Duterte.

episodes.title: 'Maniningil kami,' Risa Hontiveros warns those endangering witnesses in Quiboloy probe
episodes.description:
Sen. Risa Hontiveros on Monday (June 30) said her office will file a criminal complaint against those behind the video exposing the witnesses in her committee's probe into alleged crimes involving Pastor Apollo Quiboloy, as well as a former witness, Michael Maurilio, who now claims to have been bribed by the lawmaker for his testimony. In her statement, Hontiveros detailed messages between her office and Maurilio as evidence of his voluntary participation in the investigation.

episodes.title: Witness in Quiboloy probe alleges bribery; Hontiveros readies 'serious legal response' | ANC
episodes.description:
Sen. Risa Hontiveros said Thursday (June 26) she was preparing a “serious legal response” against an alleged witness who claimed he was paid by the lawmaker to give false testimonies against Pastor Apollo Quiboloy, former President Rodrigo Duterte, and Vice President Sara Duterte during the Senate hearings last year.
“We are preparing our serious legal response against this act of harassment and intimidation. Hindi namin palalampasin ang mga nasa likod ng pananakot na ito,” Hontiveros said in a statement.
In a video posted on the Facebook page Pagtanggol Valiente, a certain Michael Maurilio who uses the alias “Rene”, said he was speaking voluntarily to set the record straight.

episodes.title: Former 'inner circle' member first to testify against Apollo Quiboloy
episodes.description:
Kingdom of Jesus Christ (KOJC) former member Teresita Valdehueza was the first to testify against leader Apollo Quiboloy this Wednesday. Valdehueza gave details about the abuses they allegedly experienced and witnessed under KOJC.

episodes.title: Footage: Actual surrender, arrest of Apollo Quiboloy | ABS-CBN News
episodes.description:
The PNP has released footage of the surrender and subsequent arrest of Apollo Quiboloy.

Quiboloy "peacefully" surrendered after being cornered by police, and following numerous negotiations with authorities, according to the PNP.

episodes.title: Court did not order police to stop KOJC operations to arrest Quiboloy — DOJ | ANC
episodes.description:
A court did not order the police to stop its ongoing operations at the Kingdom of Jesus Christ compound in Davao City to arrest fugitive pastor Apollo Quiboloy, the Department of Justice said Wednesday.
